text_logic_form: The line $RV$ is the base of the trapezoid $RSTV$.
The line $ST$ is also the base of the trapezoid $RSTV$.
The line $MN$ is the median of the trapezoid $RSTV$.
The length of the line $MN$ is $60$ units.
The length of the line $ST$ is $4x - 1$ units.
The length of the line $RV$ is $6x + 11$ units.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The line $RV$ is the base of the trapezoid $RSTV$.
The line $ST$ is also the base of the trapezoid $RSTV$.
The line $MN$ is the median of the trapezoid $RSTV$.
The length of the line $MN$ is $60$ units.
The length of the line $ST$ is $4x - 1$ units.
The length of the line $RV$ is $6x + 11$ units.
line_instances: There are lines $NT$, $NV$, $ST$, $MN$, $MS$, $MR$, $RS$, $RV$, $TV$ forming the trapezoid and its median.
